kb3.name: kb3_pilots
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_pilots` ( `plt_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `plt_name` char(64) NOT NULL, `plt_crp_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `plt_externalid` int(11) default NULL, `plt_updated` datetime default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`plt_id`), UNIQUE KEY `plt_name` (`plt_name`), KEY `plt_externalid` (`plt_externalid`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
